name: The Hose Knows
description:
Your hose is possessed and hellbent on letting the city burn, but you are not. As a recruit to the firefighters Brigade, you must put out the fires and restore tranquility before time runs out.

Bonus points for finding the hidden objective.

Controls

  • Movement: W A S D + mouse to look
  • Spray: Left click
  • Power Grip: Shift
  • Jump: Space

Created for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam
